basic.description: The theory and practical aspects of the techniques of Scanning Electron Microscopy and the Electron microprobe. A project is required where the student employs these techniques to study a material of their choice. (1.5 credit units). PREREQUISITE: Permission of the instructor. EXCLUSION: GEOL 452
basic.subject: GEOL
basic.title: Applications of Scanning Electron Microscopy and Microprobe Analysis
